acc.title: Accounting of image objects and area classes
acc.description: This module will conduct the Accounting analysis. Accounting will label and calculate the area of all foreground objects (coded with 2 byte). The result are spatially explicit maps and tabular summary statistics. Details on the methodology can be found in the [Accounting product sheet](https://ies-ows.jrc.ec.europa.eu/gtb/GTB/psheets/GTB-Objects-Accounting.pdf).

requirement._4: Provide a byte images. Reafect the classes into the 4 following classes : background, foreground, special background 1 and special background 2. the remaining bands will be considered as missing data.
